title: Consumer Price Index Continues To Climb
itunes:title: Consumer Price Index Continues To Climb
description:
David Katz, President and Chief Investment Officer at Matrix Asset Advisors, gives his market outlook for 2022 and discusses CPI and inflation. Jeffrey Cleveland, Director and Chief Economist for Payden & Rygel, talks about inflation, labor, and CPI data. Mary Ann Miller, VP of Client Experience, Fraud, and Cybercrime Executive Advisor at Prove, has the latest on cybersecurity amid the holiday shopping season and how supply chain issues increase instances of fraud. Cam Simpson, Senior Editor and Reporter with Bloomberg Businessweek, discusses his Big Take story on MSCI, the largest ESG rating company, and the ESG mirage. Hosted by Matt Miller and Sonali Basak.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
